entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
